type-departure-date: Enter a departure date or a period (e.g 29.02 or 29.02-07.03)
type-arrival-date: Enter an arival date or a period (e.g 29.02 or 29.02-07.03) or a trip duration or a range (e.g 7 or 7-14) or click Search Now button for one way trip
too-long-period: Entered date period is too long
no-flights-found: No flights by specified criteria found
